WorkflowInfo.Name: Monitor list of URLs
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:CreateMemoryTable;Assembly=CreateMemoryTable, Version=1.1.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:URLCheck;Assembly=URLCheck, Version=1.1.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:CreateMemoryTable IsValid="True" x:Name="createMemoryTable1" ColumnNumber="2" TableName="list" RowNumber="3" isEmptyGrid="0" Description="Creates a memory table." DisplayName="Create Memory Table" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" TableAsString="<NewDataSet>
 <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata">
 <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:MainDataTable="resultSet" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
 <xs:element name="resultSet">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:sequence>
 <xs:element name="Column1" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Column2" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 </xs:sequence>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:choice>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:schema>
 <resultSet>
 <Column1>http://www.ayehu.com/</Column1>
 <Column2>ayehu</Column2>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <Column1>http://www.google.com</Column1>
 <Column2>google</Column2>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <Column1>http://www.bing.com</Column1>
 <Column2>bing</Column2>
 </resultSet>
</NewDataSet>" /> <ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" ResultSet="%list%" ResultSetName="list" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." DisplayName="Get Rows Count" TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"> <ns2:ExitWhile DisplayName="Exit While" x:Name="exitWhile1" Description="Exit current while activity" IsValid="True" TypeName="ExitWhile" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" /> <ns3:GetCellValue IsValid="True" x:Name="URL" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%list%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="list" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns3:GetCellValue IsValid="True" x:Name="phrase" ColumnNumber="2" ResultSet="%list%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="list" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns4:URLCheck SrcPassword="" Proxy="" TimeInSeconds="0" TextToSearch="%phrase%" DisplayName="URL Check" IsValid="True" SiteId="0" Password="" TypeName="URLCheck" SiteName="Default Site" Description="Search a phrase in the specified URL" SrcUserName="" x:Name="urlCheck1" Timeout="00:01:00" UserName="" ProxyUrls="" isChecked="False" byPass="False" Url="%URL%" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"> <ns5:ReturnValue Value="Success" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Success)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"> <ns5:ReturnValue Value="Failure" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Failure)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns6:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="%getCellValue1% is not available" DestinationNumber="1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" x:Name="sendEmail1" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="%getCellValue1% is not available" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Permissions: <NewDataSet><xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata"><xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true"><xs:complexType><xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"><xs:element name="resultSet"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="Type" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Number" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Read" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Write" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Run" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Owner" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:choice></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:schema><resultSet><Type>1</Type><Number>1</Number><Read>true</Read><Write>true</Write><Run>true</Run><Owner>true</Owner></resultSet></NewDataSet>
